players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: remained silent.
You: "Bob was killed, so he was not mafia. Mafia must be either Charlie or Diana. I suspect Charlie because he was silent."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie and found him to be mafia. Bob was killed, so he was not mafia. Charlie is silent and knows I'm the detective. We should vote Charlie."
You: "I agree with Diana. Charlie is mafia. Vote him."
Diana: "I am the detective, I investigated Charlie and found him mafia. Bob was killed, so he was not mafia. Charlie is silent and knows I'm detective. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: remained silent.
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
